channel.title: Dragon egg
channel.description:
I was told that in bukkit for 1.1, there is a configuration that, when enabled, allows the breaking of the dragon egg in the end to spawn a new dragon.
I went to the end and tried to break it but the egg just teleports, so is this true and its just disabled?

item.title: Dragon egg
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Link me to where, I doubt that is an option in bukkit itself, probably another plugin.

Read full topic
